ack.title: Contributors
ack.p: CD conceived and designed the study, performed and supervised experimental analyses, and interpreted the results and wrote the manuscript with JEM. JEM also designed and performed the statistical analysis of the data. JF contributed to experimental data collection. POA, NB, CLK, and SOS were responsible for the curation of sample sets and previous relevant data from the MenAfriVac studies. All authors provided critical review and approved the final draft of the manuscript.
